#### Fence Creek ####
```{r}
FENC_HOBO_23 <- read_csv("C:\\Users\\mariah.kachmar\\Documents\\Github\\EAD-ASEB_EPA_LISS_Disease_Surveillance\\HOBO_Data\\112023_FENC_HOBO.csv", col_names = TRUE)   

as.data.frame(FENC_HOBO_23)
FENC_HOBO_23

#Change column names

FENC_HOBO_23 <- FENC_HOBO_23 %>%
  dplyr::rename(Temperature = `Ch:1 - Temperature   (Â°C)`) %>%
  dplyr:: rename(Date_Time = `Date-Time (EST/EDT)`)


# Hourly Means
FENC_means <- FENC_HOBO_23 %>%  
                      dplyr::mutate(Date_Time = as.factor(substr(Date_Time,1,13))) # remove minutes and seconds

  melt(id.vars = c("Date_Time"),measure.vars = c("Temperature")) %>%
  group_by(Date_Time, variable) %>%
  summarise(mean_value = mean(value, na.rm = TRUE),
            sd_value = sd(value, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  group_by(Date_Time) %>%
  summarise(mean_value = mean(mean_value),
            sd_value = sqrt(sum(sd_value^2) / n()),  # Calculate standard error using sd
            se_value = sd_value / sqrt(n()))


print(FENC_means)
FENC_means
```
